titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an extension of the work opportunity tax credit for certain targeted groups.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/23/2013--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2018 the work opportunity tax credit for hiring certain employees who are described as members of a targeted group, including: (1) a qualified ex-felon, (2) a vocational rehabilitation referral, (3) a qualified summer youth employee, and (4) a qualified supplemental nutrition assistance program recipient.
